thread.title: Lisa Haydon joins the star cast of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
thread.title_full: Lisa Haydon joins the star cast of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil

author: Deccan
title: Lisa Haydon joins the star cast of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 17, 2015, 11.58 am Mumbai: Karan Johar's next directorial 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil' has already garnered so much popularity by now. Even the stars Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma keep posting their pictures while shooting on the sets for their fans. However, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan was spotted at the Mumbai airport while leaving for Vienna recently. Actor Fawad Khan will also seen playing a hot DJ in the film. If rumours are to believed, Imran Abbas and Saif Ali Khan will also be seen playing cameos in the film. The latest we hear is, stunning Lisa Haydon will be in an interesting role in the film. Lisa gained fame in Bollywood with her flawless acting in 'Queen' followed 'The Shaukeens' and will also be seen in ‘Housefull 3’. After completing their London and Paris schedule, the team is currently shooting in Vienna. Looks like ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’ is going to be a platter of glamorous stars.
